# [Interview #403: AOL Chat 2, Entry #51](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=403#51)

#### Question

You're an amazing author! If only everyone else in the world was like you, then the world might be a better place.

#### Robert Jordan

How true, how true.
